derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent.: from Spanish, from Aymara or Quechua

means.word_mean: 1. the expensive silvery gray fur of the chinchilla
2. a thick twilled fabric of wool and cotton
3. small rodent with soft pearly gray fur; native to the Andes but bred in captivity for fur

auth_sentence.content: February - Costa Rica elects first woman president, Laura Chinchilla, who takes office in May.

auth_sentence.content: "Somos prisioneiros da nossa geografia", disse a presidente Laura Chinchilla, em uma entrevista ao The Wall Street Journal.
